Name: Conceal Source Maps
Description: This step moves source maps to the specified location and patches reference in the source code

Parameters.Name: CsmWorkingDir
Parameters.Label: Working directory
Parameters.HelpText: Relative path to the folder with output files and source maps

Parameters.Name: CsmTargetPath
Parameters.Label: Target path
Parameters.HelpText: Path where source maps should be moved to

Parameters.Name: CsmPublicUrl
Parameters.Label: URL of exposed target directory
Parameters.HelpText: This will be prefixed to the source map references in output files
